titles.title: GHOST Act of 2025
GHOST Act of 2025
Global Hunt for Offshore Smuggling and Trafficking Act of 2025

A bill to establish and authorize funding for a Russia Sanctions Enforcement Fund to enforce United States sanctions with respect to the Russian Federation and its illegal ghost ship fleet to pay off the United States public debt and to codify the Export Enforcement Coordination Center.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
